remarks: Associative law for scalar product in a closed kernel dual vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Mar-2015.)
statement:
lcdvsass.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcdvsass.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdvsass.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
lcdvsass.l $e |- L = ( Base ` R ) $.
lcdvsass.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
lcdvsass.d $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdvsass.f $e |- F = ( Base ` C ) $.
lcdvsass.s $e |- .xb = ( .s ` C ) $.
lcdvsass.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcdvsass.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. L ) $.
lcdvsass.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. L ) $.
lcdvsass.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
lcdvsass $p |- ( ph -> ( ( Y .x. X ) .xb G ) = ( X .xb ( Y .xb G ) ) ) $.
